layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18 [color=#FF0000]
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18 [color=#008000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 166x18
            text run at (0,0) width 166: "This line should be green."
